Game.Name: Super Metal Crusher (Japan)
Game.plot: Strategy game where you design a robot by allocating points to various stats, then let it scrap it out with an opponent while you watch.http://www.pcengine.co.uk/HTML_Games/Super_Metal_Crusher.htmCheat: Manual Robot ControlAt the menu screen before you start a match, put the cursor on 'Start' and enter the code.Cheat: Battle Mode PasswordsEnter the codes in the password screen to start on the select battle. All Crusher stats are set at default, please use the in-game Adjust feature to your our play styleCheat: Battle Mode PasswordsEnter this as a password...
Game.Notes: Strategy game where you design a robot by allocating points to various stats, then let it scrap it out with an opponent while you watch. (From The PC Engine Software Bible)
